title: Ask AI
subtitle: Ask AI anything you want
detail:
About


Hi! Here you can experience the latest in big language modelling technology.

Your Privacy Matters:


To protect your privacy, the servers on this site do not store any of yourpersonal information or chat logs. All information is stored locally in your browser, which includes, but is not limitedto: your settings choices, chat logs (if turned on), etc. You can delete all your caches by clicking here.

We use the latest technology to protect your privacy, but please note that we cannotguarantee absolute security. If you have any concerns about privacy, please do not use this site.
For moreinformation please refer to our Privacy Policy

Available Models


The currently supported models are as follows:

LLaMa 3.1: The most powerful andup-to-date open-source model for Meta AI. LLaMa 3.1 also supports hardware TPU acceleration, which allows super fast response like rocket üöÄ

GPT-4o: OpenAI's latest commercial multi-purpose model. OpenAI's latest commercial multimodal model. Will be more stable to use than LLaMa 3.1, but slightly longer responsetime üõ†Ô∏è

Problems


If you encounter any problems during use, please feel free to contact me and please attach a screenshot of the error. Thanks!üôè
